SDARTS
 PREV PACKAGE   NEXT PACKAGE FRAMES    NO FRAMES

Package edu.columbia.cs.sdarts.common

Class Summary
FieldNames A "constants container" for all legal STARTS field names and codes.
LSPBooleanOp Represents a "boolean-op" as defined in the STARTS 1.0 specification.
LSPContentSummary Represents an "scontent-summary", as defined in the STARTS 1.0 spec.
LSPContentSummaryBuilder Creates an LSPContentSummary.
LSPDoc Represents the "doc" element as defined in the STARTS 1.0 specification.
LSPField Represents a "field" element as described in the STARTS 1.0 specification.
LSPFilter Represents a "filter", as defined in STARTS 1.0.
LSPMetaAttributes Represents the "smeta-attributes" element of STARTS 1.0.
LSPMetaAttributesBuilder Creates an LSPMetaAttributes.
LSPMetaAttributeSet This helper object fits inside the LSPMetaAttributes object, which, as per STARTS 1.0, stores all meta-attributes for a specific source.
LSPModifier Represents a "modifier" as defined in the STARTS 1.0 specification.
LSPObject The base class for nearly all the object headers in SDARTS.
LSPProxOp Represents a "prox-op" as defined in the STARTS 1.0 specification.
LSPQuery Represents an "squery", as defined by the STARTS 1.0 specification.
LSPQueryBuilder Creates an LSPQuery from incoming STARTS XML.
LSPRanking Represents a "ranking", as defined in STARTS 1.0: one of possibly several criteria for ranking results.
LSPResults Represents the "sqresults" header, as defined in STARTS 1.0.
LSPSortByField A representation of the "sort-by-field" header of STARTS 1.0 This header is found inside an LSPQuery, and tells the BackEndLSP what fields should be used for sorting the results.
LSPSource Represents a "source", as defined in STARTS 1.0.
LSPTerm Represents a STARTS "term", as described by the specification.
LSPValue Wraps some kind of value stored in a STARTS header, for example inside the STARTS "term" (LSPTerm).
ModifierNames A "constants container" for all legal STARTS modifier names and codes.
STARTS A "constants container" class holding constants related to STARTS.
